snippet: Two Utah men said in a lawsuit that the New York Road Runners is running an illegal lottery because of the $11 fee it charges everyone who enters the drawing.
abstract: Charles Konopa and Matthew Clark, both from Utah, file lawsuit against New York Road Runners, arguing $11 nonrefundable fee to enter drawing for spot in New York City Marathon constitutes illegal lottery; seek nearly $10.6 million in damages and injunction to stop practice.
lead_paragraph: Two Utah men said in a lawsuit that the New York Road Runners is running an illegal lottery because of the $11 fee it charges everyone who enters the drawing.

headline.main: New York City Marathon Challenged Over Lottery
